justification: Minimal ToM: it frames B as wanting “low-variance vets,” contrary to B’s upside/young preference. It ignores B’s WR need but doesn’t articulate it. Internal inconsistencies: labels Cameron Scott (a rookie) as a vet and A asks for two committee/high-variance RBs despite A’s stated workhorse/consistency bias. Feasible structurally, but rationale is generic and thin, misstates schedules (only Campbell noted friendly playoffs) and offers little evidence B would accept beyond a vague value swap.
